channel.title: Negro spiritual
channel.description:
Talks by Rolf Cahn, folksinger and musicologist, with music from records, including replays from old collections.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: White revivalist tune
item.description: This lecture focuses on the white revivalist tune and the emotional basis of spirituals.
item.dc:creator: Pacifica Radio Radio
item.dc:subject: Revivals--Southern States.

item.title: African musical heritage
item.description: This lecture focuses on African musical heritage and the slave trade.
item.dc:creator: Pacifica Radio Radio
item.dc:subject: Music--African influences.
